title: verify smooth scrolling context initialization
description: Test the root layout to ensure the smooth scrolling context is properly initialized and provides consistent smooth scrolling behavior across the site.

title: validate reusable ui components rendering
description: Verify that all reusable UI components such as Buttons, Cards, Sections, MagneticButton, and GlassCard render correctly with expected styles and behaviors.

title: test tour booking page functionality
description: Perform end-to-end testing of the tour booking page including browsing tours, interacting with booking forms, and completing a reservation to ensure functional correctness.

title: check animation libraries integration
description: Validate that GSAP and Lenis animation libraries are correctly integrated and animations trigger smoothly without performance issues on UI interactions.

title: ensure tailwind css v4 styling compliance
description: Verify that there are no CSS warnings or errors related to Tailwind CSS v4 in the VS Code environment and during the build process.

title: confirm nextjs font and image optimization
description: Test usage of Next.js next/font/local for fonts and next/image for images to ensure optimization and reduction of cumulative layout shifts (CLS).

title: validate client component directives
description: Check that all client components using browser APIs include the explicit "use client" directive to prevent React hydration errors.

title: verify package dependencies compatibility
description: Ensure that all package dependencies for Next.js, React, GSAP, Lenis, and other libraries are compatible and stable with no conflicts.

title: test global styles and font loading
description: Verify that global styles and fonts defined in the root layout and globals.css are loaded correctly and applied consistently across all pages.

title: check configuration files correctness
description: Validate the correctness and best practices compliance of project configuration files such as next.config.ts and postcss.config.mjs.
